    This is the placeholder for maintening information about alive nodes and the relation between a Call-Id and its attributed node.

    If your algorthm return an instance of this class the load balancer will not forward the request anywhere.

    A transaction stateful UDP Forwarder that listens at a port and forwards to multiple outbound addresses.

    Class holding information about a node such as hostname, ip address, port and transports supported.
